name: OIDANOID
description:
A twin-stick arena based shooter that takes no prisoners.

Just killing the bad guys isn't enough.  To get the points you have to eat the biscuits they drop.  Be warned though... You're not the only one after the biscuits. There are power-ups a plenty and lots of hidden tricks to find. 

BETA warning:  May contain traces of bugs.
The final version of the game will contain additional game modes and skill settings.

** PLEASE NOTE **
This game requires a dual stick game controller to be able to play.

This beta version is free to download and play.  However if you'd like to make a donation to buy me a drink and a cake that would be most gratefully received.

macOS version is also in the works.
